description:
Decades of Beauty demonstrates through detailed video lectures how to recreate the incredible beauty styles of past decades. This course includes history references, style references and Step-By-Step Video Demonstrations. Artist Danessa Myricks shows you in detail how to create each element of the look, including Brow Shaping, Smokey Eyes, Lashes and Lips all while adding a contemporary twist to these classic beauty looks while discussing the principles of each looks traditional defining elements. 

This course is structured by decade and each decade includes detailed video demonstrations for Eyes, Brows, Lashes, Lips and Face. Due to the unique versatility and vastness of this course curriculum, this course will be regularly expanded upon by Danessa Myricks to include new decades and new interpretations on classic styles overtime.

This is a fantastic course for professional makeup artists, but it is also a fun and dynamic course for anyone interested in learning to create classic beauty styles.
title: Decades of Beauty
